DOC.brief_summary: The main hypothesis is that PET-CT will be a valuable diagnostic tool in diagnosing and evaluating treatment for IBD.
DOC.brief_title: Positron Emission Tomography (PET)-Computed Tomography (CT) in Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD)
DOC.criteria: Patient with either Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis whose disease is flaring Indeterminate diagnosis, pregnant, breastfeeding, or other contraindication to PETCT
